section.title: Description
section.paragraph: This element groups together sets of options.
This element is optional and may appear one or more times per scheme.

attributes.attribute: A unique name for the group.

section.title: Data
section.paragraph: This element contains no textual data.

section.title: Engine Requirements
section.paragraph: The text defined in the label attribute should be displayed where applicable, such as a popup menu folder or group box caption.
